mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hawking, W. N. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hawking, W. N.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 21 1862. By Telegraph from Charleston 21 1862. Sir We have recd one full company & organized it & have some twenty five (25) men for a second company Can you furnish some pants & sock's-reply W N Hawking Adjt USA 29D92pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hawking, W. N.
Charleston, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
